DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether glycemic control ( HbA1c ) link chromosomal damage type 2 Diabetes patient
DOC.brief_title: Chromosomal Damage Type 2 Diabetes Patients ( MIKRODIAB )
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes ( T2DM ) Sex : female Age : > 30years Medication : oral antidiabetic and/or Insulin therapy Constant nutritional behavior , constant physical activity , constant weight last 4 week Nonsmoking least 1 year Patients type 1 DM Age : < 30years Pregnant lactate woman Participation another clinical trial Change medication regard metabolic parameter within last 4 week Significant cardiovascular damage NYHA > III Liver disease threetimes high transaminase value Chronic kidney disease serum creatinine > 2 mg/dl Dialysis HIV positive History chronic alcohol abuse last two year History cancer , stroke , organ transplantation Male
